verses.verse: The LORD<WH3068> reigns;<WH4427> let the people<WH5971> tremble:<WH7264> he sits<WH3427> between the cherubim;<WH3742> let the earth<WH776> be moved.<WH5120>
The LORD<WH3068> is great<WH1419> in Zion;<WH6726> and he is high<WH7311> above<WH5921> all<WH3605> the people.<WH5971>
Let them praise<WH3034> your great<WH1419> and terrible<WH3372> name;<WH8034> for it is holy.<WH6918>
The king's<WH4428> strength<WH5797> also loves<WH157> judgment;<WH4941> you do establish<WH3559> equity,<WH4339> you execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and righteousness<WH6666> in Jacob.<WH3290>
Exalt<WH7311> you the LORD<WH3068> our God,<WH430> and worship<WH7812> at his footstool;<WH1916> <WH7272> for he is holy.<WH6918>
Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> among his priests,<WH3548> and Samuel<WH8050> among them that call<WH7121> on his name;<WH8034> they called<WH7121> on the LORD,<WH3068> and he answered<WH6030> them.
He spoke<WH1696> to them in the cloudy<WH6051> pillar:<WH5982> they kept<WH8104> his testimonies,<WH5713> and the ordinance<WH2706> that he gave<WH5414> them.
You answered<WH6030> them, O LORD<WH3068> our God:<WH430> you were<WH1961> a God<WH410> that forgave<WH5375> them, though you took vengeance<WH5358> of their inventions.<WH5949>
Exalt<WH7311> the LORD<WH3068> our God,<WH430> and worship<WH7812> at his holy<WH6944> hill;<WH2022> for the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> is holy.<WH6918>
